pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Series Forecast System // A web application for displaying, analysing and forecasting univariate time series. Includes basic methods such as mean, nave, seasonal nave and drift, as well as more complex methods such as Holt-Winters Box,G and Jenkins, G (1976) doi:10.1111/jtsa.12194 and ARIMA Brockwell, P.J. and R.A.Davis (1991) doi:10.1007/978-1-4419-0320-4.
